items.headline: Bitcoin’s slumping again. The biggest corporate owner admits it may have to sell if things get worse.
items.summary_en: Bitcoin sprinted higher over the holiday, but that’s now fading and bitcoin’s biggest corporate holder says they’d be forced to sell if things worsen.

items.headline: Judge may force sale of Nicki Minaj’s $20 million SoCal mansion over debt owed to former security guard
items.summary_en: A judge says she is close to forcing the sale of Nicki Minaj’s L.A. home after the rapper allegedly refused to pay damages awarded to a former security guard who claims he was assaulted by Minaj’s husband.

items.headline: U.S. stock futures dip after last week’s rally capped a rocky November
